EmailTemplate.name: Webcast - AV Offer New
EmailTemplate.subject: Hey, We Heard You Like Virtualization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, So you're interested in the latest and greatest in virtualization.
Well what if we told you there was a place where you can access all of the latest news on all things virtualization, a Disney Land for Infrastructure pros if you will.
Well you don't have to travel to Florida to visit this magical world. About: Virtualization offers the latest in virtualization from some of the best experts in the industry. Pick your poison from:
- Virtualization <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/virtualization/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=av> - Cloud <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/cloud-about-virtualization/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=av> - SDx <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/sdx/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=av> - Performance <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/performance-about-virtualization/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=av> - DevOps <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/devops/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=av> - Best Practices <http://vmturbo.com/category/about-virtualization/best-practices/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=av>
Here is something to get you started, Ops Are from Mars, Devs Are from Venus: Big Data is Giving Ops Big Headaches <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/virtualization/ops-from-mars-devs-from-venus-big-data-is-giving-ops-big-headaches?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_stencil_love&utm_content=av>.
See you there!
- The VMTurbo Team
